outbounds.description: List of outbound tags to test.

url.description:
The URL to test.

`https://www.gstatic.com/generate_204` will be used if empty.

interval.description:
The test interval.

`3m` will be used if empty.

tolerance.description:
The test tolerance in milliseconds.

`50` will be used if empty.

idle_timeout.description:
The idle timeout.

`30m` will be used if empty.

interrupt_exist_connections.description: Interrupt existing connections when the selected outbound has changed.
